name: Color Game V1.8 latest
description:
This is an infinite strategy game with infinite waves and many possibilities. You have a rectangle you need to protect against the enemys. 

Your Controls:

-WASD or Arrow keys to move

-R or press the mouse wheel to reload

-Leftclick to shoot

-switch to pistole/main weapon with 1 or 2 or by scrolling

-press F1 to show movement and mouse on screen 

-press F2 to enable cheats: infinite ammo, infinite lifes and never ending bullets

Caution: epileptical attack possible
